name: autonomist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who believes in or supports autonomy (= the right of an organization, country, or region to be independent and govern itself): During World War II, German newspapers criticized attacks by the Czechs against the Slovak autonomists. Autonomists in the national assembly were protesting for the right to separate from the country and form their own republic.

Related word
autonomy
believing in or supporting autonomy (= the right of an organization, country, or region to be independent and govern itself): Leading figures in the autonomist movement were sowing dissent in the hope of building support for independence. Other world leaders fear that the group's successful push for independence will lead to autonomist uprisings in their own countries.
